# scatools

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

scatools is a package meant for performing copy number analysis in scATAC data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of scatools from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mjz1/scatools")
```

## User Guide

Please see [documentation website](https://mjz1.github.io/scatools/)
